io.lettuce.core.cluster.api.sync

接口 NodeSelectionServerCommands<K,V>

  • 类型参数:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    所有已知子接口:
    NodeSelectionCommands<K,V>

    public interface NodeSelectionServerCommands<K,V>
    Synchronous executed commands on a node selection for Server Control.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Executions<String> bgrewriteaof()
      Asynchronously rewrite the append-only file.
      Executions<String> bgsave()
      Asynchronously save the dataset to disk.
      Executions<K> clientGetname()
      Get the current connection name.
      Executions<Long> clientKill(KillArgs killArgs)
      Kill connections of clients which are filtered by killArgs

      Kill the connection of a client identified by ip:port.

      Get the list of client connections.

      Stop processing commands from clients for some time.

      Set the current connection name.

      Returns an array reply of details about all Redis commands.

      Get total number of Redis commands.

      Returns an array reply of details about the requested commands.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bgrewriteaof

        Executions<String> bgrewriteaof()
        Asynchronously rewrite the append-only file.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply always OK.

      • bgsave

        Executions<String> bgsave()
        Asynchronously save the dataset to disk.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • clientGetname

        Executions<K> clientGetname()
        Get the current connection name.
        返回:
        K bulk-string-reply The connection name, or a null bulk reply if no name is set.

      • clientSetname

        Executions<String> clientSetname(K name)
        Set the current connection name.
        参数:
        name - the client name
        返回:
        simple-string-reply OK if the connection name was successfully set.

      • clientKill

        Executions<String> clientKill(String addr)
        Kill the connection of a client identified by ip:port.
        参数:
        addr - ip:port
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply OK if the connection exists and has been closed

      • clientKill

        Executions<Long> clientKill(KillArgs killArgs)
        Kill connections of clients which are filtered by killArgs
        参数:
        killArgs - args for the kill operation
        返回:
        Long integer-reply number of killed connections

      • clientPause

        Executions<String> clientPause(long timeout)
        Stop processing commands from clients for some time.
        参数:
        timeout - the timeout value in milliseconds
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply The command returns OK or an error if the timeout is invalid.

      • clientList

        Executions<String> clientList()
        Get the list of client connections.
        返回:
        String bulk-string-reply a unique string, formatted as follows: One client connection per line (separated by LF), each line is composed of a succession of property=value fields separated by a space character.

      • command

        Executions<List<Object>> command()
        Returns an array reply of details about all Redis commands.
        返回:
        List<Object> array-reply

      • commandInfo

        Executions<List<Object>> commandInfo(String... commands)
        Returns an array reply of details about the requested commands.
        参数:
        commands - the commands to query for
        返回:
        List<Object> array-reply

      • commandInfo

        Executions<List<Object>> commandInfo(CommandType... commands)
        Returns an array reply of details about the requested commands.
        参数:
        commands - the commands to query for
        返回:
        List<Object> array-reply

      • commandCount

        Executions<Long> commandCount()
        Get total number of Redis commands.
        返回:
        Long integer-reply of number of total commands in this Redis server.

      • configGet

        Executions<Map<String,String>> configGet(String parameter)
        Get the value of a configuration parameter.
        参数:
        parameter - name of the parameter
        返回:
        Map<String,String> bulk-string-reply

      • configResetstat

        Executions<String> configResetstat()
        Reset the stats returned by INFO.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply always OK.

      • configRewrite

        Executions<String> configRewrite()
        Rewrite the configuration file with the in memory configuration.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply OK when the configuration was rewritten properly. Otherwise an error is returned.

      • configSet

        Executions<String> configSet(String parameter,
                             String value)
        Set a configuration parameter to the given value.
        参数:
        parameter - the parameter name
        value - the parameter value
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply: OK when the configuration was set properly. Otherwise an error is returned.

      • dbsize

        Executions<Long> dbsize()
        Return the number of keys in the selected database.
        返回:
        Long integer-reply

      • debugCrashAndRecover

        Executions<String> debugCrashAndRecover(Long delay)
        Crash and recover
        参数:
        delay - optional delay in milliseconds
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • debugHtstats

        Executions<String> debugHtstats(int db)
        Get debugging information about the internal hash-table state.
        参数:
        db - the database number
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • debugObject

        Executions<String> debugObject(K key)
        Get debugging information about a key.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • debugReload

        Executions<String> debugReload()
        Save RDB, clear the database and reload RDB.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply The commands returns OK on success.

      • debugRestart

        Executions<String> debugRestart(Long delay)
        Restart the server gracefully.
        参数:
        delay - optional delay in milliseconds
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • debugSdslen

        Executions<String> debugSdslen(K key)
        Get debugging information about the internal SDS length.
        参数:
        key - the key
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • flushall

        Executions<String> flushall()
        Remove all keys from all databases.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • flushallAsync

        Executions<String> flushallAsync()
        Remove all keys asynchronously from all databases.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • flushdb

        Executions<String> flushdb()
        Remove all keys from the current database.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • flushdbAsync

        Executions<String> flushdbAsync()
        Remove all keys asynchronously from the current database.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • info

        Executions<String> info()
        Get information and statistics about the server.
        返回:
        String bulk-string-reply as a collection of text lines.

      • info

        Executions<String> info(String section)
        Get information and statistics about the server.
        参数:
        section - the section type: string
        返回:
        String bulk-string-reply as a collection of text lines.

      • lastsave

        Executions<Date> lastsave()
        Get the UNIX time stamp of the last successful save to disk.
        返回:
        Date integer-reply an UNIX time stamp.

      • save

        Executions<String> save()
        Synchronously save the dataset to disk.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply The commands returns OK on success.

      • slaveof

        Executions<String> slaveof(String host,
                           int port)
        Make the server a slave of another instance, or promote it as master.
        参数:
        host - the host type: string
        port - the port type: string
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • slaveofNoOne

        Executions<String> slaveofNoOne()
        Promote server as master.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply

      • slowlogGet

        Executions<List<Object>> slowlogGet()
        Read the slow log.
        返回:
        List<Object> deeply nested multi bulk replies

      • slowlogGet

        Executions<List<Object>> slowlogGet(int count)
        Read the slow log.
        参数:
        count - the count
        返回:
        List<Object> deeply nested multi bulk replies

      • slowlogLen

        Executions<Long> slowlogLen()
        Obtaining the current length of the slow log.
        返回:
        Long length of the slow log.

      • slowlogReset

        Executions<String> slowlogReset()
        Resetting the slow log.
        返回:
        String simple-string-reply The commands returns OK on success.

      • time

        Executions<List<V>> time()
        Return the current server time.
        返回:
        List<V> array-reply specifically: A multi bulk reply containing two elements: unix time in seconds. microseconds.
